```{r 05-remove-all, include = FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
```


## Processing all files

<details><summary>Setup code</summary>
```{r include = FALSE}
### Processing all files

```
```{r 05-setup-05-map-r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

dict <- readxl::read_excel(here("data/cities.xlsx"))

input_files <-
  dict %>%
  select(city_code, weather_filename) %>%
  deframe()
```


```{r include = FALSE}
# Read a single input file
```
```{r 05-read-a-single-input-file}
readxl::read_excel(here(input_files[[1]]))
```


```{r include = FALSE}
# Read all input files
```
```{r 05-read-all-input-files}
input_data <-
  map(input_files, ~ readxl::read_excel(here(.)))
```


```{r include = FALSE}
# Analyze the results
```
```{r 05-analyze-the-results}
input_data
input_data[[1]]
names(input_data)
```


```{r include = FALSE}
# Pipe notation
```
```{r 05-pipe-notation}
input_files %>%
  map(~ readxl::read_excel(here(.)))
```
